info.name: Flip Type - Twitter
info.description: Turns your tweet backwards when typing in the timeline tweetbox.
info.additionalInfo: Most useless theme I have ever created, has no real purpose. Also you can't backspace, so good luck if you're a bad typer. Do not sue me if an internet poopstorm starts because of a typo. But seriously, try some of my other styles. Especially the D|e|c|l|u|t|t|e|r| |S|e|r|i|e|s, it unbreaks your websites unlike this theme.
